name: Triggerfish Drill Sergeant
description:
Triggerfish Drill Sergeant is a single-player puzzle game where you organize and recruit troops to create the proper parade ground drill formations.

In Triggerfish Drill Sergeant, take charge of your troops, from the raw recruits to the battle-tested veterans. Lead them through drills and navigate them through parade grounds to prepare for the horrors of war. Press on as your troops forge past missiles, lasers, and ruthless killers.

Features:

  • Explore challenging and deep puzzle mechanics.
  • Overcome new obstacles over a multitude of different parade grounds.
  • Face new types of recruits that challenge your planning mastery.
  • Organize your troops in the comfort of relaxing tunes by Forgotten Dawn.
  • Create and play custom user-created drills

Play the demo, view the launch trailer, and find more information at anglerteamgames.com
